champ:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
champ:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL If you are not in a Stance, enter a random Stance.
champ:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies. NL If you are not in a Stance, enter a random Stance.

champ:Execute.NAME: Execute
champ:Execute.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL champ:Fatigue 4.

champ:StanceDance.NAME: Stance Dance
champ:StanceDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL champ:Opener - Choose a Stance.

champ:GladiatorsShout.NAME: Gladiator's Shout
champ:GladiatorsShout.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Draw 1 card.
champ:GladiatorsShout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Draw 2 cards.

champ:SwordSigil.NAME: Sword Sigil
champ:SwordSigil.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Repeat !M! times, then Exhaust.

champ:FocusedGladiator.NAME: Focus: Gladiator
champ:FocusedGladiator.DESCRIPTION: champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Until you exit champ:Gladiator Stance, champ:Techniques draw 1 extra card.

champ:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
champ:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

champ:FlashCut.NAME: Flash Cut
champ:FlashCut.DESCRIPTION: champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike.

champ:Balance.NAME: Balance
champ:Balance.DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Defensive or champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
champ:Balance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Defensive or champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Defensive champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Defensive champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:DefensiveShout.NAME: Defensive Shout
champ:DefensiveShout.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Draw 1 card.
champ:DefensiveShout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Draw 2 cards.

champ:ShieldSigil.NAME: Shield Sigil
champ:ShieldSigil.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Repeat !M! times, then Exhaust.

champ:FocusedDefense.NAME: Focus: Defensive
champ:FocusedDefense.DESCRIPTION: champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Until you exit champ:Defensive Stance, champ:Techniques grant 3 extra champ:Counterstrike.

champ:FocusedBerserking.NAME: Focus: Berserker
champ:FocusedBerserking.DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Until you exit champ:Berserker Stance, champ:Techniques grant 2 extra champ:Resolve.

champ:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
champ:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Discard all Attacks in hand and gain !M! champ:Counterstrike for each.

champ:Backstep.NAME: Backstep
champ:Backstep.DESCRIPTION: champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Gain Block equal to your champ:Resolve.

champ:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
champ:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Berserker or champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
champ:Aggression.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Berserker or champ:Gladiator. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Berserker champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Berserker champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Gladiator champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Gladiator champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:BerserkersShout.NAME: Berserker's Shout
champ:BerserkersShout.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Draw 1 card.
champ:BerserkersShout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Draw 2 cards.

champ:RageSigil.NAME: Rage Sigil
champ:RageSigil.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Repeat !M! times, then Exhaust.

champ:GutPunch.NAME: Gut Punch
champ:GutPunch.DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL champ:Fatigue 2. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain 10 champ:Resolve and Exhaust.

champ:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
champ:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Repeat if you have a champ:Technique in hand.
champ:FanOfKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Repeat 2 times if you have a champ:Technique in hand.

champ:Devastate.NAME: Devastate
champ:Devastate.DESCRIPTION: Must be in champ:Gladiator Stance. NL champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage for each champ:Finisher played this combat.
champ:Devastate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage for each champ:Finisher played this combat.

champ:Control.NAME: Control
champ:Control.DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Defensive or champ:Berserker. NL Add a random champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
champ:Control.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Opener - champ:Defensive or champ:Berserker. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Combo card to your hand of the chosen Stance.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Defensive champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Add a random champ:Berserker champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Defensive champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Defensive champ:Combo to your hand.
champ:Berserker champ:Opener. NL Add a random Upgraded champ:Berserker champ:Combo to your hand.

champ:Circumvent.NAME: Circumvent
champ:Circumvent.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike.

champ:SkillfulDodge.NAME: Skillful Dodge
champ:SkillfulDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Increase this card's Block and champ:Counterstrike by !cool! this combat.

champ:TornadoPunch.NAME: Tornado Punch
champ:TornadoPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike for each enemy that intends to attack.
champ:TornadoPunch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike for each enemy that intends to attack.

champ:EnGarde.NAME: En Garde
champ:EnGarde.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Double your champ:Counterstrike.

champ:ShieldSlam.NAME: Shield Slam
champ:ShieldSlam.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 30 Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

champ:EnchantShield.NAME: Enchant Shield
champ:EnchantShield.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Ignore the first time you would lose HP this turn. NL Exhaust.
champ:EnchantShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Ignore the first time you would lose HP this turn. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:BringItOn.NAME: Bring It On
champ:BringItOn.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike. NL Exhaust.
champ:BringItOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:ShieldThrow.NAME: Shield Throw
champ:ShieldThrow.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal damage equal to your Block. NL You can't gain Block next turn. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: You can gain Block next turn.

champ:FalseCounter.NAME: False Counter
champ:FalseCounter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! champ:Counterstrike. NL The next time champ:Counterstrike activates, lose half your champ:Counterstrike instead of removing it.

champ:IronFortress.NAME: Iron Fortress
champ:IronFortress.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter a Stance, gain !M! Block.

champ:Lariat.NAME: Lariat
champ:Lariat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! champ:Counterstrike X times. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Increase X by 1.

champ:HoldFirm.NAME: Hold Firm
champ:HoldFirm.DESCRIPTION: Must be in champ:Defensive Stance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
champ:HoldFirm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

champ:ShieldWall.NAME: Shield Wall
champ:ShieldWall.DESCRIPTION: After you are attacked, gain !M! champ:Counterstrike.

champ:Haymaker.NAME: Haymaker
champ:Haymaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Apply 2 Vulnerable.
champ:Haymaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 2 Weak. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Apply 2 Vulnerable.

champ:ViciousMockery.NAME: Vicious Mockery
champ:ViciousMockery.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Dexterity.

champ:PreciseThrust.NAME: Precise Thrust
champ:PreciseThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Increase this card's damage and Block by !M! this combat.

champ:CrookedStrike.NAME: Crooked Strike
champ:CrookedStrike.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Enemy loses 1 Strength this turn for each card in hand.

champ:RapidStrikes.NAME: Rapid Strikes
champ:RapidStrikes.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each champ:Technique used this turn.
champ:RapidStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each champ:Technique used this turn. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Repeat twice more.

champ:EnchantSword.NAME: Enchant Sword
champ:EnchantSword.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust.
champ:EnchantSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:BladeFlurry.NAME: Blade Flurry
champ:BladeFlurry.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each champ:Technique in hand. NL Exhaust.
champ:BladeFlurry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each champ:Technique in hand. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:SwordThrow.NAME: Sword Throw
champ:SwordThrow.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL You can't attack next turn. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: You can attack next turn.

champ:MurderStrike.NAME: Murder Strike
champ:MurderStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you use a champ:Technique, reduce this card's cost by 1 and increase its damage by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

champ:HeavySlash.NAME: Masterful Slash
champ:HeavySlash.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each Upgraded card in your deck.

champ:CheapShot.NAME: Cheap Shot
champ:CheapShot.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy. NL Repeat for each card with champ:Technique in hand.

champ:RisingSlash.NAME: Rising Slash
champ:RisingSlash.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Play this twice if the last played card was a champ:Technique.

champ:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
champ:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Remove the enemy's Block and Artifact before dealing damage.

champ:EnragedBash.NAME: Enraged Bash
champ:EnragedBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Fatigue !M!. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Increase this card's damage and champ:Fatigue by !cool! this combat.

champ:VampiricStrike.NAME: Vampiric Strike
champ:VampiricStrike.DESCRIPTION: Must be in champ:Berserker Stance. NL champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage twice. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
champ:VampiricStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage twice. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

champ:AdrenalArmor.NAME: Adrenal Armor
champ:AdrenalArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL champ:Fatigue !M!. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Play this 2 times.
champ:AdrenalArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Gain !B! Block. NL champ:Fatigue !M!. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Play this 2 times.

champ:HeartStrike.NAME: Heart Strike
champ:HeartStrike.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal damage equal to your champ:Resolve. NL Exhaust.
champ:HeartStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal damage equal to your champ:Resolve. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:FinalRevenge.NAME: Final Revenge
champ:FinalRevenge.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
champ:FinalRevenge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.

champ:CrownThrow.NAME: Crown Throw
champ:CrownThrow.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! less cards next turn. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Don't draw less cards.

champ:FightOn.NAME: Fight On
champ:FightOn.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Can't be Upgraded. NL Can only be played if you have at least 30 champ:Resolve. NL Gain 5 Max HP.

champ:Encircle.NAME: Encircle
champ:Encircle.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times. NL champ:Berserker champ:Combo: champ:Fatigue 4. NL Hits !M! more times.

champ:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
champ:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Can only be played if you're under 50% HP. NL Remove all debuffs. NL Gain 6 Strength.

champ:RecklessLeap.NAME: Reckless Leap
champ:RecklessLeap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL champ:Fatigue 7. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

champ:IgnorePain.NAME: Ignore Pain
champ:IgnorePain.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL Your HP cannot be reduced below 1 until your next turn. NL Exhaust.
champ:IgnorePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL champ:Technique. NL Your HP cannot be reduced below 1 until your next turn. NL Exhaust.

champ:DeathBlow.NAME: Death Blow
champ:DeathBlow.DESCRIPTION: champ:Fatigue 30. NL Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount of HP lost.

champ:ArenaPreparation.NAME: Arena Preparation
champ:ArenaPreparation.DESCRIPTION: champ:Technique. NL champ:Fatigue 8. NL Add !M! random Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

champ:EndlessRage.NAME: Endless Rage
champ:EndlessRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP on your turn, gain 1 champ:Resolve.
champ:EndlessRage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP on your turn, gain 1 champ:Resolve.

champ:SteelEdge.NAME: Steel Edge
champ:SteelEdge.DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Deal !D! damage X times. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !B! Block X times. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Draw X cards and gain X [E] .
champ:SteelEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Berserker champ:Combo: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL champ:Defensive champ:Combo: Gain !B! Block X+1 times. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Draw X+1 cards and gain X+1 [E] .

champ:Improvising.NAME: Improvising
champ:Improvising.DESCRIPTION: The first time each turn you use a champ:Combo while not in the correct Stance, return it to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

champ:CalledShot.NAME: Called Shot
champ:CalledShot.DESCRIPTION: The next champ:Finisher you play while not in champ:Gladiator does not cause your turn to end.

champ:PerfectedStrike.NAME: Perfected Strike
champ:PerfectedStrike.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

champ:Duel.NAME: Duel
champ:Duel.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If there's only one enemy, play this twice.

champ:DancingMaster.NAME: Dancing Master
champ:DancingMaster.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter three unique Stances in one turn, gain [E] and draw 2 cards.
champ:DancingMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter three unique Stances in one turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.

champ:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
champ:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random champ:Opener to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.
champ:StrikeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Upgraded champ:Opener to your hand. NL It costs 0 until played.

champ:DefensiveStyle.NAME: Defensive Style
champ:DefensiveStyle.DESCRIPTION: If you start your turn in champ:Defensive, gain 5 Block and 5 champ:Counterstrike.
champ:DefensiveStyle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you start your turn in champ:Defensive, gain 5 Block and 5 champ:Counterstrike.

champ:GladiatorStyle.NAME: Gladiator Style
champ:GladiatorStyle.DESCRIPTION: If you start your turn in champ:Gladiator, gain 3 guardianmod:Momentary Strength and Dexterity.
champ:GladiatorStyle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you start your turn in champ:Gladiator, gain 3 guardianmod:Momentary Strength and Dexterity.

champ:BerserkerStyle.NAME: Berserker Style
champ:BerserkerStyle.DESCRIPTION: If you start your turn in champ:Berserker, champ:Fatigue 2 and gain [E] .
champ:BerserkerStyle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you start your turn in champ:Berserker, champ:Fatigue 2 and gain [E] .

champ:EnchantCrown.NAME: Enchant Crown
champ:EnchantCrown.DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain [E] at the start of your next 3 turns. NL Exhaust.
champ:EnchantCrown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: champ:Finisher. NL Gain [E] at the start of your next 3 turns. NL Exhaust. NL champ:Gladiator champ:Combo: Don't Exhaust.
